The way he holds the shirts looks so nice.

name: gormster
text: A comment left by gormster was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by rowboat, anticitizen, hurry)

name: andrew_
text: I feel like I really made a difference by ordering a "GODDAMMIT WHAT AM I GOING TO DO ABOUT MY PROBLEMS" shirt. I'm so excited.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
I really like the slogan t-shirts, particularly the last one. I've thought about purchasing one but unfortunately I've been kind of depressed myself lately and keep having beef-like ideas of what would happen if I bought and wore them when my friends know I've been sad.
Maybe I should buy them and just open my closet to shake my head and hold them up once every so often. Just to complete the idea. heh.

Dude and Catastrophe it is!

name: quantumcasaba
text: Er, I suppose I should mention that I only know one person who would 'get it' so to the rest it would appear to be an emo celebration of 'my problems.' Thus the dilemma.

name: rykan
text:
Ah, indeed. I only have 2 other friends who would get it.
That being said, one of them has the "Dude and Catastrophe" hoody, so it would all be good...

name: ricnine
text: Why did I buy that last T-shirt within five minutes of learning of its availability? I too am an impulsive shirt orderer. 5ed for reality.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: i lamed you because of your weakness..but we're both human so we'll get over each other. or else.

text:
I Come From

text: I would wear a "This dude is from Circumstances" t-shirt.

name: lhmatt
text: bought this shirt today :( even today is not a good day.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: If Guns n' Roses were a computer program it would be AWESOME for the first couple of years.

name: spectre
text: No, Drugs 'n Roses sucked for ALL the years.

name: tekende
text: There's about ten good minutes in their career. "Sweet Child O' Mine" and "Paradise City."

name: kikineko
text: Aww, poor Roast Beef!  But I must say, I have to agree with that T-shirt he was holding: "It is impossible to have a good day."  When it seems I have a nice day... something has to ruin it.

name: zapatos
text: I bought that shirt and rode around on my bicycle all day, it was totally lovely.  My parents tried to make fun of me and I didn't even care.  Later I realized that I had a sunburn.  Damn.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Beef needs a never ending supply of hugs. And blood transfusion donors for all the times the poor bastard gets shot.

name: greenkoolayd
text: he should get a job as phillipes babysitter.  then hed have hugs on tap.
